nishpadana nirmana salasum shilpi samir chanda wisin jawanikawe darshana wiwidha konawalin rugatha kirima pahasuwimata ekinekata samana palam thunak idikarana ladi.[80][81] mulin mema palam shrilankawe, oostreliyawe ho dakunu aprikawe idikirimata salasum kara thibunath, wiyadam adu karaganime aramunin eya mumbayihi idikerini.[82][83] namuth ayahapath kalagunaya saha dadi warshawa hethuwen rugatha kirim dina kihipayakata adala wiya.[84]
